game.name: Talking Tom Playing Snowballs
game.description:
What could be a better option than calling your best friends and having fun with them in the snow? Finally, snow starts falling from the sky at the winter evening, and Tom and Angela have made out a plan to spend time with their best friends. Yes, they have already invited Ben and Ginger to play snowballs and fun together. But, they all look confused what to put on before leaving the home. Will you guide them all to explore the fun in snowballing? Join Talking Tom Playing Snowballs and prove the world that you also have dress choices for the animals, too!

Click the send button first to invite Ben and Ginger first and the next moment you will see all the four ones standing together! Then click the next button to move your game further. Your objective in this brand new animals game is to help them choose the warm outfits. Once you finalize the warm clothes for them, make sure to help them to enjoy while playing snowballs. Do not forget to have some cup of cocoa with your lovely and cute cats. 

Make sure to put the warm clothes on your favorite Talking Tom and Angela. You also have to take care of the dresses for their best friends Ben and Ginger. Above the head of your characters, you will see the outfit options. Click on them to explore the dress options and find out the ones that suit their personalities in this one of the best html5 dress-up games for kids! This mobile game is playable on all modern browsers including Chrome and Safari. Enjoy this and other top girls games online without download!
